segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the boy on the stool in the center of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is standing on a two-step stool that looks very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs of the stool are splayed out, tilted precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching upward, reaching for the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is inside the jar, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is absolutely going to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the wobble beneath my own feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and seriously hurt himself, possibly breaking dishes too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby doesn't seem to notice the danger of the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on getting a cookie from him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation fills me with immense anxiety for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stable that stool before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
